scripts.android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && react-native run-android
scripts.release: cd android && rm app/src/main/res/raw/app.json && ./gradlew assembleRelease && mv app/build/outputs/apk/release/*.apk /run/user/1000/gvfs/mtp:host=Google_Pixel_3a_01BAY1SZT2/I*/V9
scripts.connect: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 & adb devices
